reference.title: cxxFriendStorageClassSpecifierMutable
reference.shortdesc: Marks a friend functions that have a mutable storage-class-specifier.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFriendStorageClassSpecifierMutable> element is present when the friend function is mutable. The element has two mandatory attributes: name and value Both of these attributes have the default value “mutable”.
The mutable specifier can be applied only to names of class data members and cannot be applied to names declared const or static, and cannot be applied to reference members.

example.title: Example
example.p: Then function X::p would have the element:
If the mandatory attributes are present they must be set thus:
